QuestData.Title: The Prophet's Final Message
QuestData.Description: This unassuming iridescent crystal contains some of the final thoughts of Great Prophet Velen, created sometime in the hours before he confronted Ner'zhul.$b$bDeliver the crystal to Prophet Velen's Memorial beneath the Coliseum of Light near Karabor to hear his final message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Prophet's Arcanum to Prophet Velen's Memorial beneath the Coliseum of Light in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: The arcanum hums in your hand as you get close to the memorial.
QuestData.RewardText: The shrine has dozens of niches where the Prophet's followers have placed their own memory crystals, mourning the great leader's sacrifice. You slide the crystal into an empty socket and the memorial comes to life...
